name: Concerts and Music Festivals
description: See your favorite musicians perform live at concerts and music festivals around the world.

name: Theater and Performing Arts
description: Experience the magic of live theater and performing arts, from Broadway shows to ballet performances.

name: Film Screenings and Premieres
description: Catch the latest movies on the big screen, or be one of the first to see a new release at a premiere event.

name: Comedy Shows
description: Laugh the night away at a comedy show, featuring some of the funniest comedians in the world.

name: Sports Events
description: Cheer on your favorite team at a live sporting event, from baseball to basketball to football.

name: Museums and Exhibitions
description: Explore the world's most fascinating museums and exhibitions.
